mapper.select: SELECT EAT_SEQ_NO as eatSeqNo, TITLE as title, EAT_CONTENTS as eatContents, USER_NAME as userName, REG_DT as regDt, CHG_DT as chgDt FROM EAT_INFO
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO EAT_INFO ( EAT_SEQ_NO, TITLE, EAT_CONTENTS,
REG_DT, CHG_DT )VALUES ( EAT_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{eatContents},
SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
